column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Nancy - Thank you very much for the excellent and thorough review! I'm very pleased to know you and your friends enjoyed your stay with us. I'm especially happy that you received good service from our waitstaff. We don't always hit the mark
column3: it's always very nice to receive acknowledgment. Thank you for coming through
column4: and we look forward to serving you again in the future.
